messages.content:
As the chief network security adjudicator unit,your responsibility is to determine whether an IP address should be blocked.

The IP address in question created the following logs on our server today:
```nginx.log
198.51.100.25 - - [14/Oct/2024:15:02:20 +0000] "GET /wp-content/plugins/revslider/temp/update_extract/revslider/temp/update_extract/ HTTP/1.1" 403 1542 "-" "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; Googlebot/2.1; +http://www.google.com/bot.html)"
```
